author: Ashlea Carver
title: Mixed Berry Smoothie
ingredients: 2 cups frozen mixed berries (raspberries, blueberries, blackberries)
instructions_list: Add all of the ingredients to a blender and blend until smooth and creamy.
description: This mixed berry recipe is filled with delicious mixed berries, tropical pineapple juice, and healthy fats thanks to Greek yogurt. It is smooth, creamy, and a delicious way to start your day!
keywords: how to make a mixed berry smoothie
